import '../styles/App.scss'; import data from '../data/contacts.json'; function App() { const htmContactList = () => { return data.map((oneContact, index) => { return (

  • {oneContact.name + ' ' + oneContact.lastname}

    {oneContact.phone}

    {oneContact.email}

    • ); }); }; return (
    {/* header */}

    Mi agenda de contactos

    {/* contact list */}
      {htmContactList()}
    {/* new contact */}

    Añade un nuevo contacto

    ); } export default App;
